name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Darnell WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and SAYLOR, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Darnell WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2001, the appeal in’ the above captioned case is dismissed as improvidently granted.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: J. Richard Narvin, Pittsburgh, for appellant, Darnell Williams.
Amy E. Constantine, Pittsburgh, for appellee, Com. of PA.
casebody.head_matter:
779 A.2d 1152
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Darnell WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 12, 2000.
Decided Sept. 25, 2001.
J. Richard Narvin, Pittsburgh, for appellant, Darnell Williams.
Amy E. Constantine, Pittsburgh, for appellee, Com. of PA.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and SAYLOR, JJ.
